mapinfo.detailsText: Deep in the Dwarven Mines of the Norselands lies gold and hidden treasure. Raid the abandoned Forges for bonus gold, and play on Regicide mode to feature a custom Regent, the Fire King, Halogi.
mapinfo.loadDetails: Raid the abandoned Forges for bonus gold, and play on Regicide mode to feature a custom Regent, the Fire King, Halogi.
